org.b3log.latke.repository.gae
类 GAETransaction

java.lang.Object
  org.b3log.latke.repository.gae.GAETransaction
所有已实现的接口：
org.b3log.latke.repository.Transaction
public final class GAETransaction
extends Object
implements org.b3log.latke.repository.Transaction

Google App Engine datastore transaction. Just wraps Transaction simply.

In this transaction, the caller can get data (by id) for retrieving previous writes. Because the add, update and remove will effect on the transaction cache, operation results specified by id.

版本：
1.0.0.8, Dec 3, 2011
作者：
Liang Ding
另请参见：
GAERepository

另请参见：
常量字段值

cache

private Map<String,org.json.JSONObject> cache
Transaction cache.

The cache is used to maintain transactional add, update and remove uncommitted effects on datastore for subsequent get (by id) queries can retrieve the result made before.

Holds data like <oId, json>.

clearQueryCache

private boolean clearQueryCache
Flag of clear query cache.

参数：
id - the specified id
jsonObject - the specified uncommitted json object

commit

public void commit()
Commits this transaction with 3 times of retries.

If the transaction committed, clears all transaction cache. If the flag is true, clears global cache regions.

Throws:
ConcurrentModificationException - if commits failed

指定者：
接口 org.b3log.latke.repository.Transaction 中的 commit
另请参见：
COMMIT_RETRIES, cache, PageCaches.removeAll()
